components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Mozambique Movitel

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate this issue.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Mozambique Movitel. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide an update as soon as we have additional information.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays from Subset of Twilio Short Codes to US Sprint

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for SMS from a subset of Twilio Short Codes to US Sprint. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

The Tele2 mobile network in Russia will be conducting a maintenance on their SMS platform, Tuesday, June 16 16:00 - Tuesday, June 16 20:00 PDT. During this maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering their SMS sent to Tele2 handsets, as well as message status events.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in the US is conducting a scheduled maintenance from 16 June 2020 at 21:00 PDT until 17 June 2020 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets via US shortcodes and US longcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US Toll-Free SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 June 2020 at 21:00 PDT until 18 June 2020 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from US handsets via US toll-free numbers.
